commit.message: DHFPROD-5691: Fix outstanding issues found by coverity static scan

nodes.bodyText: What was the issue with "synchronized"? I don't know if it's actually needed, but I also don't know the impact of removing it.

I think the fileOut declaration needs to be moved into the "if" block - otherwise, it never gets closed. Could just do:
FileCopyUtils.copy(buffer, new FileOutputStream(outputFile));
